head.supplied: [Baron von Mueller, who is taking great interest in the experimental farm of the Bairnsdale School of Mines, has forwarded another parcel of new and choice seeds.]...

div.p: To the Bairnsdale School of Mines

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter nor found. For the text given here, see Bairnsdale advertiser and Tambo and Omeo chronicle, 3 November 1892, p. 2. M's sending is dated to late October 1892, to allow sufficient time for his parcel to reach the School of Mines and for news of its arrival to be reported to the newspaper in time to be included in this issue.

p.seg: [Baron von Mueller, who is taking great interest in the experimental farm of the Bairnsdale School of Mines, has forwarded another parcel of new and choice seeds.]
